name: Super Bus Squad: Omega Edition
description:
Another Desert Bus for Hope has ended, and it's time to put the props back into storage. But some props won't go quietly. It's time to call.. the SUPER BUS SQUAD.

Keyboard Controls:

Move: Arrows or WASD
Fire: Shift, Control, Enter
Jump: Space
Switch Weapon: Q/E, -/+, Tab

Controller Support dependent on Browser.

The Omega Edition includes:

  • More Weapons
  • Longer Levels with new assets
  • Bonus Stage
  • Tweaked Bosses
  • New Music

Original made for Desert Bus For Hope Jam made alongside the Desert Bus For Hope Marathon 2018
